title: 3dROIMaker
description: Create a labelled set of ROIs from input data, useful in combining functional and tractographic/structural data.

gm_map.title: GM map of ROIs
gm_map.description: GM map of ROIs based on value- and volume-thresholding, corresponding to gray matter regions of activation.

gmi_map.title: GMI map of inflated ROIs
gmi_map.description: Map of inflated GM ROIs based on GM map, with ROIs inflated either by user-design or WM skeleton.
